Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sudoku
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Sudoku which contains a grid and functionality to manipulate the grid. Also contains further methods pertaining to the game (such as is the game finished).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
